attributes.action: Change the national anthem to homerton B American boy remix
attributes.additional_details: We wanted our national anthem to be a more British sounding one we thought that the current national anthem didn’t sound very British it sounded more like the russian red army anthem
attributes.background: Change the national anthem to a more British sounding one like the remix of American boy, homerton B

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
